content:
One thing that came up today is that there are a lot of tools in the ecosystem. However, we are hopefully not asking most users to directly use a lot of these tools (e.g. wasm-tools) themselves. Here's a rough diagram I tossed together to help us start to map out how we expect the tooling landscape to look.
image.png
Yeah ideally most developers will be using one tool, at least for "popular wasm source languages"
CI scripts and other infrastructury things will inevitably need more flexibility, but that has always been true :shrug:

Robin Brown said:

A note: use a different font! kind of tricky to read!
this is the default font for Excalidraw. I can tell it to use the sharper font next time
